downloads.label: Static scenario visualisations
downloads.description: The package contains the static graphics of the emssion budgets and pathsways from the module in PDF and PNG formats. The graphics display 1.5 scenarios with full carbon removal availabilty worldwide.

downloads.label: Additional graphs
downloads.description: The additional horizontal bar charts for temperature, stranded assets, land use, and investment for each pathways in PDF and PNG formats. The graphics display 1.5 scenarios with full carbon removal availabilty worldwide.

downloads.label: Additional graphs
downloads.description: The package contains 4 high-resolution static graphics from the Towards an Electric Future module in PDF and PNG formats.

downloads.label: Additional graphs
downloads.description: The package contains high-resolution static graphics from the Fossil Fuels Risk module in PDF and PNG formats

downloads.label: Static images
downloads.description: The package contains high-resolution stills from the film »A Brief History of CO2 Emissions«.
downloads.reference: Senses (2020), A Brief History of CO2 Emission

downloads.label: Graphics
downloads.description: The package contains 5 high-resolution static graphics from the Primer to Climate Scenarios in PDF and PNG formats.
